description.value: At 15th level, you may create an area of @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{Deeper Darkness} that you can see through without penalty. All creatures except you are entangled within this darkness unless using @Compendium[pf1.spells.lvzq2mwkqmozolpl]{Freedom of Movement} or a similar effect. You may use this ability once per day.
